title: LC4 Style Chaise Longue - Special Edition
body: In 1928, Partners Le Corbusier, Charlotte Perriand and Pierre Jeanneret designed the timeless classic LC4 Chaise Longue. Dubbed by Le Corbusier himself as “the relaxing machine” The LC4 is included in the permanent collection of the Museum of Modern Art in New York.This exclusive chaise longue offers unique body comfort. The ergonomic swing echoes the body’s natural curve while the slide on the base allows ranges of relaxing sitting angles. It is the perfect way to relax at your home or office! This chaise brings class and elegance to your modern home.
